GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Chat>So, <clr:0000>Kakariko Village <clr:ffff>is just down the road.


I've heard that these strange, <clr:0000>ring-shaped
ruins<clr:ffff> fell all around the village and are
drawing quite the crowd.
I wonder if the voe of my destiny is among
them. Unlikely, but who knows?
GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Go straight ahead down this road to arrive
at <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>.

I hear large crowds have formed there
since those odd <clr:0000>ring-shaped ruins <clr:ffff>were
discovered in the area.
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think>There's an off chance that the voe of
my destiny is there too. Perhaps I should
go and find out?
FriendGreet_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>Heh!<sp:5:0:0> It's amusing, isn't it? Our little
back-and-forth.

Though jokes aside, it does make
me wonder when I'll meet the voe of
my destiny...
BackRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff> is to the <clr:0000>north<clr:ffff> up this
road. If you're interested, by all means,
go and look around.
Everyone seems busy investigating the
<clr:0000>ring-shaped ruins<clr:ffff> right now though, so
I think I'll save my visit for another day.
StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey, did you know?<sp:5:0:0> The owner of this
stable is a twin.

And that's not all.<sp:5:0:0> His younger brother's
children are also twins! It's twins as far as
the eye can see!
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>I just thought of something!<sp:5:0:0> What if the
voe of my destiny turns out to be a twin?<sp:5:0:0>

And what if he and his equally handsome
brother compete for my affections?<sp:5:1:0> Argh!<sp:5:0:0>
I won't know how to choose!
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Ease_01>*sigh*<sp:5:1:0> Listen to me, fantasizing about
love triangles when I can't even find a
decent line segment...
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The owner of this stable is a twin,
and what's more, his brother has twin
children of his own. <sp:5:1:0>How fascinating.
StartPoint_01_3:
Hm...<sp:5:1:0> You look bored. Am I boring you?


Well, you're boring me too.


<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Ease_01>It's fine. Let's both just shut up and enjoy
the music.
StartPoint_01_4:
Hm...<sp:5:1:0> You look bored. Am I boring you?


Or perhaps you want me to stop talking so
you can find the musical troupe.

<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Ease_01>Unfortunately for you, they're not here.
They must be playing at another stable.
BackRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you go <clr:0000>north<clr:ffff> up this road, you will find
<clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>I was thinking of visiting to try to find the
voe of my destiny.<sp:0:4:0>But ever since those mysterious,
ring-shaped ruins fell from the sky,
I hear the village has been all astir.
With all of those people investigating the
ruins, the atmosphere is less...<sp:5:1:0>romantic
than I had hoped.
FriendGreet_00_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughL_01>Ahaha! Oh dear... <sp:5:1:0>Apologies, but I was
only joking.

I don't think the voe of my destiny will
make himself so easy to find.

<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>But thank you for the entertainment.<sp:5:0:0>
That put a smile on my face.

Sav'orq!
RainPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>Though getting rained on is a valuable
experience, it's just so damp and
uncomfortable.
At least in Gerudo, splashing yourself
<clr:0000>staves off the heat<clr:ffff>. Here, getting wet is
merely a nuisance...
GoRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think>I hear a large number of people have
gathered in <clr:0000>Kakariko Village <clr:ffff>to study
the <clr:0000>ring-shaped ruins<clr:ffff>.
Perhaps I should go and see if the voe of
my destiny is among them.
FriendGreet_00_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Oh, you said that so bluntly... I can't help
but feel a little hurt.

<sp:3:0:2:0000>But no matter. I was only teasing.


I don't think the voe of my destiny will
make himself so easy to find.
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Chat><clr:0000>Kakariko Village <clr:ffff>is just down this road.<sp:0:4:0>Could this be where I finally meet my
destined voe?
RainPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:TalkPositive>Rain is such a nuisance in this region.<sp:5:0:0>
It makes my clothes soggy and
uncomfortable.
In the Gerudo Desert, water is useful.
You need to splash yourself with it to
<clr:0000>stave off the heat<clr:ffff>.
And in the blazing sun, the water
evaporates, which means your clothes
never get damp...
FriendGreet_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting_00>Oh my. You're quite the assertive voe,
coming and talking to me all of a sudden.

Did you know that when a Gerudo comes
of age, she goes on a journey to search
for the voe of her destiny?
I am on the middle of such a voe hunt.
And I believe you and I meeting here may
be fated.
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:LaughS_00>Don't you think so?
FriendGreet_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting_00>Oh! You're coming up to me again.


If you want to talk that badly, then
perhaps...<sp:5:1:0> Perhaps you believe we're
fated to meet here after all?
FriendGreet_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Huh? Wait...<sp:5:0:0> Really?


I'm sorry. I don't believe that you are
the voe of my destiny.

<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think>Listen... <sp:5:0:0>You have nice eyes.<sp:5:0:0> Why don't
you use them to find the partner you're
meant to be with?
